name: Headerviewexample
tagline: A Recycler View Example to show header on top.
body:
# HeaderViewExample
A Recycler View Example to show header on top.
Complete Tutorial is here : http://www.debugandroid.com/2016/09/how-to-add-header-in-recyclerview.html

![Example Screen Shots](http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-o09yzm-tJRs/V-FzuSBXHDI/AAAAAAAAA8E/NIxEL37dO4gRSxnmEV91MSlKLMwgXr8XACK4B/s1600/screenshots.PNG)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
